item.description:
IBD Levels Group

Please RSVP!

This IBD Levels focused group will keep people together who are currently working their way up the IBD Levels.

Only those seeking to move up the Levels should attend. You don't need to commit to going up to Level 4, but our overall goal will be to develop as many Level 4 candidates as possible. The next Boston seminar is the Level 2 seminar on August 16. See the 1/3 off flyer at: http://files.meetup.c....



Our activities:
  • We will review the material, the concepts, that underlie the IBD Methodology in order to develop IBD Levels expertise.
  • We will share our methods of finding IBD Method stocks.
  • We will perform projects in small teams as the opportunities arise.
  • We will share our expertise with the larger Boston IBD.




We are IBD-centric. That means:
  • That we will stick to accomplishing the IBD Method - utilizing CANSLIM. We will not have market talks, except to state the the current IBD market status.
  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....
item.name: IBD Levels Group
